Bernard Farcy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernard_Farcy 0 Bernard Farcy (born 2 February 1949) is a French actor. He is best known for his role in French action-comedy franchise Taxi. Bernard_Farcy ( born 2_February_1949 ) is a_French_actor . He is_best_known for his_role in French_action-comedy_franchise_Taxi .
